Terms & Conditions

* To access the EURO24 coupon code offer, please enter coupon code EURO24 at checkout on uk.hyperx.com to get additional 24% off at checkout on select products displayed on uk.hyperx.com/collections/euros-2024. The coupon code will expire on 14/07/2024 at 23.59 GMT. Single use per customer. Available whilst stocks last. Requires acceptance of Terms and conditions of Sales and Service. Purchases made using voucher code must be for personal use and not for resale. Coupon code is non-exchangeable, non-transferable and no cash alternative is offered, except as required by law. This coupon code cannot be used in conjunction with any other coupon code. HP is not responsible for lost or stolen coupon codes. HP reserves the right, acting reasonably and in accordance with all relevant legislation and codes of practice to change or cancel this offer at any time.
